item.title: Pulsar : Towards Ubiquitous Visible Light Localization
item.description: More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: VLCS'17 Workshop Program is up
item.description: The VLCS’17 program has been published on the workshop website.

item.title: Conferences
item.description: You will find below a list of conferences and workshop you should watch if your interested in VLC. International Conference on Embedded Wireless Systems and Networks (EWSN) IEEE International Conference on Computer Communications (INFOCOM) ACM/IEEE International Conference on Information Processing in Sensor Networks (IPSN) IEEE International Conference on Communications (ICC) ACM Conference onMobile Systems, Applications, and Services (MobiSys) IEEE International Conference on Sensing, Communication and Networking (SECON) ACM Conference on Mobile Computing and Networking (MobiCom) ACM Workshop on Visible Light Communication Systems (VLCS) ACM Conference on Embedded Networked Sensor Systems (SenSys)

item.title: Research Groups
item.description: Labs, research groups and companies involved in VLC.
